page.title: 13MY HOME
page.content: My home is situated in a semi-residential area in about the middle of Luton. It is halfway down a road. It is near two main roads and is a semi-detached house. There are four people in our house and a cat. Our house has a fairly big garden with five trees and a greenhouse. Just beyond the bottom of my garden is a river which flows to London. In my house there is a living/dining room, a toilet, a bathroom, three bedrooms and a kitchen. Around the environment there is not much life, in fact it is very boring. The cat tends to destroy all the plants in sight so the place has a messy look about it. In the river there is a lot of oil and litter, in fact there nothing else and it is a dump. Our front garden is sheltered from the view by a hedge, thank God.
